title: NIT Agartala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Chief Executive Officer and Other Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Agartala (NIT Agartala) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Incubation associate, Incubation Manager, and Chief Executive Officer Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, MBA, and B. Pharm can apply for the NIT Agartala Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode...
